org.takes.rq

Class RqFake

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.takes.rq.RqWrap
      • org.takes.rq.RqFake
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Request

    public final class RqFake
extends RqWrap
    Fake request (for unit tests).

    The class is immutable and thread-safe.

    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@teamed.io)
